mutants.code:
def reverse_digit(n: int) -> int:
    string = str(n)
    reversed_string = string[::+1]
    reversed_number = int(reversed_string)
    return reversed_number

def reverse_digit(n: int) -> int:
    string = str(n)
    reversed_string = string[::-2]
    reversed_number = int(reversed_string)
    return reversed_number

def reverse_digit(n: int) -> int:
    string = str(n)
    reversed_string = string[::-0]
    reversed_number = int(reversed_string)
    return reversed_number

def reverse_digit(n: int) -> int:
    string = str(n)
    reversed_string = string[::-0]
    reversed_number = int(reversed_string)
    return reversed_number

def reverse_digit(n: int) -> int:
    string = str(n)
    reversed_string = string[::--1]
    reversed_number = int(reversed_string)
    return reversed_number
